sense.def:
A week
je obdobje sedmih dni, zlasti če se začne z nedeljo ali ponedeljkom.

seg.quote: He died in an explosion a few weeks ago.

sense.def:
One's working week
so ure, ki jih med tednom preživimo ob delu.

seg.quote: I work a thirty-five hour week.

sense.def:
The week
so dnevi v tednu razen sobote in nedelje.

seg.quote: She never goes out during the week.

sense.def:
Izraz
week
uporabljamo v frazah, kot so
a week on Monday
,
a week next Tuesday
in
tomorrow week
. Pomenijo natančno teden dni od dneva, ki ga omenimo.

Izraz
week
uporabljamo v frazah, kot so
a week last Monday
in
a week ago this Tuesday
. Pomenijo natančno teden dni pred dnevom, ki ga omenimo.

seg.quote: She died a week last Thursday.
